mesa verd (disambiguation). mesa verd nation park iucn categori ii (nation park) mesa verd northeast locat montezuma county, colorado, unit states, north america nearest&#160;c mancos, colorado coordin 37°11′02″n 108°29′19″w﻿ / ﻿37.183784°n 108.488687°w﻿ / 37.183784; -108.488687coordinates: 37°11′02″n 108°29′19″w﻿ / ﻿37.183784°n 108.488687°w﻿ / 37.183784; -108.488687 area 52,485 acr (21,240&#160;ha) establish june&#160;29,&#160;1906&#160;(1906-06-29) visitor 572,329 (in&#160;2011)[1] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic unesco world heritag site type cultur criteria iii design 1978 (2nd session) reference&#160;no. 27 state parti unit state region europ north america u.s. nation regist histor place design octob 15, 1966 reference&#160;no. 66000251 mesa verd nation park nation park world heritag site locat montezuma county, colorado. protect best preserv ancestr puebloan archeolog site unit states. park creat presid theodor roosevelt 1906. occupi 52,485 acr (21,240&#160;ha) near four corner region american southwest, 4,300 sites, includ 600 cliff dwellings, largest archeolog preserv us. mesa verd (spanish "green table") best known structur cliff palace, thought largest cliff dwell north america. start c. 7500 bce, mesa verd season inhabit group nomad paleo-indian known foothil mountain complex. varieti projectil point found region indic influenc surround areas, includ great basin, san juan basin, rio grand valley. later, archaic peopl establish semi-perman rockshelt around mesa. 1000 bce, basketmak cultur emerg local archaic population, 750 ce ancestr puebloan develop basketmak culture. mesa verdean surviv use combin hunting, gathering, subsist farm crop corn, beans, squash. built mesa' first pueblo sometim 650, end 12th centuri began construct massiv cliff dwell park best known. 1285, follow period social environment instabl driven seri sever prolong droughts, abandon area move south locat arizona new mexico, includ rio chama, pajarito plateau, santa fe. content 1 inhabit 1.1 paleo-indian 1.2 archaic 1.3 basketmak cultur 1.4 ancestr puebloan 1.4.1 pueblo i: 750 900 1.4.2 pueblo ii: 900 1150 1.4.3 pueblo iii: 1150 1300 1.4.4 warfar 1.4.5 migrat 1.4.6 organ 1.4.7 architectur 1.4.8 astronomi 1.4.9 agricultur water-control system 1.4.10 hunt forag 1.4.11 potteri 1.4.12 rock art mural 2 anthropogen ecology, geography, climat 3 geolog 4 rediscoveri 4.1 wetheril 4.2 gustaf nordenskiöld 5 nation park 5.1 excav protect 5.2 servic 5.3 wildfir cultur modifi tree 5.4 ute mountain tribal park 6 key site 6.1 balconi hous 6.2 cliff palac 6.3 long hous 6.4 mug, oak tree, spruce tree, squar tower hous 7 refer 8 extern link inhabitants[edit] paleo-indians[edit] paleo-indian hunt glyptodont, heinrich harder c. 1920 first occup mesa verd region, span southeastern utah northwestern new mexico, nomad paleo-indian arriv area c. 9500 bce.[2] follow herd big game camp near river streams, mani dri glacier cover part san juan mountain receded. earliest paleo-indian clovi cultur folsom tradition, defin larg way fashion projectil points. although left evid presenc throughout region, littl indic live central mesa verd time.[3] 9600 bce, area' environ grew warmer drier, brought pine forest anim thrive central mesa verde. paleo-indian began inhabit mesa increas number c. 7500, though unclear whether season occup year-round residents. develop atlatl period made easier hunt smaller game, crucial advanc time region' big game disappear landscape.[4] archaic[edit] archaic pictographs, c. 2500 bce, sego canyon, utah 6000 bce mark begin archaic period north america. archeologist differ origin mesa verd archaic population; believ develop exclus local paleo-indians, call foothil mountain complex, other suggest varieti projectil point found mesa verd indic influenc surround areas, includ great basin, san juan basin, rio grand valley. archaic peopl probabl develop locally, also influenc contact, trade, intermarriag immigr outli areas.[5] earli archaic peopl live near mesa verd util atlatl harvest wider varieti plant anim paleo-indian had, retain primarili nomad lifestyle. inhabit outli area mesa verd region, also mountains, mesa tops, canyons, creat rockshelt rock art, left evid anim process chert knapping. environment stabil period drove popul expans migration. major warm dri 5000 2500 might led middl archaic peopl seek cooler climat mesa verde, whose higher elev brought increas snowpack that, coupl spring rains, provid rel plenti amount water.[5] late archaic peopl live semi-perman rockshelt preserv perish good baskets, sandals, mats. start make varieti twig figurin usual resembl sheep deer. late archaic mark increas trade exot materi obsidian turquoise. marin shell abalon pacif coast made way mesa verd arizona, archaic peopl work necklac pendants. rock art flourished, peopl live rudimentari hous made mud wood. earli attempt plant domest eventu develop sustain agricultur mark end archaic period, c. 1000.[6] basketmak culture[edit] basketmak ii basket, c. 1 500 introduct corn mesa verd region c. 1000 bce trend away nomad toward perman pithous settlements, archaic mesa verdean transit archeologist call basketmak culture. basketmak ii peopl character combin forag farm skills, use atlatl, creation fine woven basket absenc earthen pottery. 300, corn becom preemin stapl basketmak ii people' diet, reli less less wild food sourc domest crops.[7][a] addit fine basketri named, basketmak ii peopl fashion varieti household item plant anim materials, includ sandals, robes, pouches, mats, blankets. also made clay pipe game pieces. basketmak men rel short muscular, averag less 5.5 feet (1.7&#160;m) tall. skelet remain reveal sign hard labor extens travel, includ degen joint disease, heal fractures, moder anemia associ iron deficiency. buri dead near amongst settlements, often includ luxuri item gifts, might indic differ rel social status. basketmak ii peopl also known distinct rock art, found throughout mesa verde. depict anim people, abstract realist forms, singl work elabor panels. common subject hunchback flute player hopi call kokopelli.[9] basketmak iii basket, c. 450 750 500 ce atlatl supplant bow arrow basket pottery, mark end basketmak ii era begin basketmak iii era.[10] ceram vessel major improv pitch-lin baskets, gourds, anim hide containers, primari water storag contain region. potteri also protect seed mold, insects, rodents. 600, mesa verdean use clay pot cook soup stews.[11] year-round settlement first appear around time. popul san juan basin increas markedli 575, basketmak iii site mesa verde; earli 7th centuri mani site mesa. next 150 year villag typic consist small group one three residences. popul mesa verd c. 675 approxim 1,000 1,500 people.[12] bean new varieti corn introduc region c. 700.[13] 775, settlement grown accommod one hundr people; construct large, ground storag build began around time. basketmak endeavor store enough food famili one year, also retain residenti mobil could quickli reloc dwell event resourc deplet consist inadequ crop yields.[12] end 8th century, smaller hamlets, typic occupi ten forti years, supplant larger one saw continu occup mani two generations.[14] basketmak iii peopl establish tradit hold larg ceremoni gather near commun pit structures.[15] ancestr puebloans[edit] main article: ancestr puebloan pueblo i: 750 900[edit] main article: pueblo period major ancestr puebloan settlement san juan basin pueblo protokiva chapin mesa, mesa verd nation park 750 mark end basketmak iii era begin pueblo period. transit character major chang design construct build organ household activities. pueblo peopl doubl capac food storag one year two built interconnected, year-round resid call pueblos. mani household activ previous reserv subterranean pithous move above-ground dwellings. alter function pithous all-purpos space one use primarili commun ceremonies, although continu hous larg extend families, particularli winter months.[16] late 8th century, mesa verdean began build squar pit structur archeologist call protokivas. typic 3 4 feet (0.91 1.22&#160;m) deep 12 20 feet (3.7 6.1&#160;m) wide.[17] first pueblo appear mesa verd sometim 650; 850 half mesa verdean live them. local popul grew, puebloan found difficult surviv hunting, foraging, gardening, made increasingli reliant domest corn. shift semi-nomad "sedentari commun way life chang ancestr pueblo societi forever".[18] within gener averag number household settlement grew one three fifteen twenty, averag popul two hundr people. popul densiti increas dramatically, mani dozen famili occupi roughli space formerli hous two. brought increas secur raid encourag greater cooper amongst residents. also facilit trade intermarriag clans, late 8th century, mesa verde' popul augment settler south, four distinct cultur group occupi villages.[19] larg pueblo settlement laid claim resourc found within 15 30 squar mile (39 78&#160;km2). typic organ group least three space 1 mile (1.6&#160;km) apart. 860, approxim 8,000 peopl live mesa verde.[20] within plaza larger villages, pueblo peopl dug massiv pit structur 800 squar feet (74&#160;m2) becam central gather places. structur repres earli architectur express would eventu develop pueblo ii era great hous chaco canyon. despit robust growth earli mid-9th century, unpredict rainfal period drought led dramat revers settlement trend area. mani late pueblo villag abandon less forti year occupation, 880 mesa verde' popul steadi decline.[21] begin 10th centuri saw widespread depopul region, peopl emigr south san juan river chaco canyon search reliabl rain farming.[22] mesa verdean migrat south, mani ancestor emigr two hundr year before, influenc chaco canyon grew, 950 chaco supplant mesa verd region' cultur center.[21] pueblo ii: 900 1150[edit] main article: pueblo ii period squar tower hous pueblo ii period mark growth outreach commun center around great hous chaco canyon. despit particip vast chacoan system, mesa verdean retain distinct cultur ident meld region innov ancient tradition, inspir architectur advancements; 9th centuri mesa verdean pueblo influenc two hundr year chacoan great hous construction.[22] drought late 9th centuri render mesa verdean dri land farm unreliable, led grow crop near drainag next 150 years. crop yield return healthi level earli 11th century.[23] 1050 popul area began rebound; agricultur prosper increased, peopl immigr mesa verd south. [22] mesa verdean farmer increasingli reli masonri reservoir pueblo ii era. 11th century, built check dam terrac near drainag slope effort conserv soil runoff. field offset danger crop failur larger dri land fields.[24] mid-10th earli 11th centuries, protokiva evolv smaller circular structur call kivas, usual 12 15 feet (3.7 4.6&#160;m) across. mesa verde-styl kiva includ featur earlier time call sipapu, hole dug north chamber symbol ancestr puebloan' place emerg underworld.[17] time, mesa verdean began move away post mud jacal-styl build mark pueblo period toward masonri construction, util region earli 700, widespread 11th 12th centuries.[25] expans chacoan influenc mesa verd area left visibl mark form chaco-styl masonri great hous becam focal point mani mesa verdean villag 1075.[22] years.[27] earli 12th century, locu region control shift away chaco aztec, new mexico, southern mesa verd region.[22][b] 1150, drought stress region' inhabitants, lead temporari cessat great hous construct mesa verde.[29] pueblo iii: 1150 1300[edit] main article: pueblo iii period cliff palac largest cliff dwell mesa verd nation park.[30] sever drought 1130 1180 led rapid depopul mani part san juan basin, particularli chaco canyon. extens chacoan system collapsed, peopl increasingli migrat mesa verde, caus major popul growth area. led much larger settlement six eight hundr people, reduc mobil mesa verdeans, past frequent reloc dwell field part agricultur strategy. order sustain larger populations, dedic labor farming. popul increas also led expand tree fell reduc habitat mani wild plant anim speci mesa verdean reli on, deepen depend domest crop suscept drought-rel failure.[31] chacoan system brought larg quantiti import good mesa verd late 11th earli 12th centuries, includ pottery, shells, turquoise, late 12th century, system collapsed, amount good import mesa quickli declined, mesa verd becam isol surround region.[32] approxim six hundr years, mesa verdean farmer live small, mesa-top homestead one two families. typic locat near field walk distanc sourc water. practic continu mid- late 12th century, start 13th centuri began live canyon locat close water sourc within walk distanc fields.[33] mesa verdean villag thrive mid-pueblo iii era, architect construct massive, multi-stori buildings, artisan adorn potteri increasingli elabor designs. structur built period describ "among world' greatest archaeolog treasures".[34] pueblo iii masonri build typic occupi approxim fifti years, doubl usabl lifespan pueblo ii jacal structures. other continu inhabit two hundr year more. architectur innov tower multi-wal structur also appear pueblo iii era. mesa verde' popul remain fairli stabl 12th centuri drought.[35] start 13th century, approxim 22,000 peopl live there.[36] area saw moder popul increas follow decades, dramat one 1225 1260.[28] peopl region live plain west mesa locat yellow jacket pueblo, near cortez, colorado.[37] other colon canyon rim slope conditions, puebloan continu farm area sever dri period 1276 1299 end seven hundr year continu human occup mesa verde.[23] archeologist refer period "great drought".[41] last inhabit mesa left area c. 1285.[42] warfare[edit] oak tree hous pueblo iii period (1150 1300), mesa verdean built numer stone masonri tower like serv defens structures. often incorpor hidden tunnel connect tower associ kivas.[43] warfar conduct use tool mesa verdean use hunt game, includ bow arrows, stone axes, wooden club spears. also craft hide basket shield use battles.[44] period warfar occur mesa throughout 13th century.[28] civic leader region like attain power prestig distribut food time drought. system probabl broke "great drought", lead intens warfar compet clans.[45] increas econom social uncertainti century' final decad led widespread conflict. evid partli burn villag post-mortem trauma uncovered, resid one villag appear victim site-wid massacre.[46] evid violenc cannib document central mesa verd region.[47][c] violence, peak 1275 1285, gener ascrib in-fight amongst mesa verdeans, archeolog evid found sand canyon pueblo, canyon ancient nation monument, suggest violent interact also occur mesa verdean peopl outsid region.[28] evid attack discov member crow canyon archaeolog center 1990s. assaults, also occur nation monument' castl rock pueblo, date c. 1280, consid effect end sever centuri puebloan occup sites.[48] mani victim show sign skull fractures, uniform injuri suggest inflict small stone axe. other scalped, dismembered, cannibalized. anthropophagi (cannibalism) might undertaken surviv strategi time starvation.[49] archeolog record indic that, rather isol mesa verd region, violent conflict widespread north america late 13th earli 14th centuries, like exacerb global climat chang neg affect food suppli throughout continent.[50] migration[edit] mesa verd region saw unusu cold dri condit begin 13th century. might driven emigr mesa verd less hospit locations. ad popul stress mesa' environment, strain agricultur societi suffer drought.[51] region' bimod precipit pattern, brought rainfal spring summer snowfal autumn winter, began fail post-1250.[41] 1260, rapid depopul mesa verde, "ten thousand people" emigr die starvation.[28] mani smaller commun four corner region also abandon period.[52][53] ancestr puebloan long histori migrat face environment instability, depopul mesa verd end 13th centuri differ region almost complet emptied, descend return build perman settlements.[54] drought, resourc depletion, overpopul contribut instabl last two centuri ancestr puebloan occupation, overdepend maiz crop consid "fatal flaw" subsist strategy.[55][d] vacat mesa verdean left almost direct evid migration, left behind household goods, includ cook utensils, tools, clothing, gave archeologist impress emigr haphazard hurried. estim 20,000 peopl live region 13th century, start 14th centuri area nearli uninhabited.[58][e] mani emigr reloc southern arizona new mexico.[59] although rate settlement unclear, increas spars popul areas, rio chama, pajarito plateau, santa fe, correspond directli period migrat mesa verde. archeologist believ mesa verdean settl area near rio grande, mesa verd black-on-whit potteri becam widespread 14th century, like relat household join unwelcom intruders. archeologist view migrat continuation, versu dissolution, ancestr puebloan societi culture.[60] mani other reloc bank littl colorado river, western new mexico eastern arizona.[61] archeologist tend focu "push" factor drove mesa verdean away region, also sever environment "pull factors", warmer temperatures, better farm conditions, plenti timber, bison herds, incentiv reloc area near rio grande.[62] addit numer settlement along rio grande, contemporari descend mesa verdean live pueblo acomo, zuni, jemez, laguna.[57][f] organization[edit] although chaco canyon might exert region control mesa verd late 11th earli 12th centuries, archeologist view mesa verd region collect smaller commun base central site relat outlier never fulli integr larger civic structure.[64] sever ancient roads, averag 15 45 feet (4.6 13.7&#160;m) wide line earthen berms, identifi region. appear connect commun shrines; other encircl great hous sites. extent network unclear, road discov lead chacoan great north road, directli connect mesa verd chacoan sites.[65] ancestr puebloan shrines, call herraduras, identifi near road segment region. purpos unclear, sever c-shape herradura excavated, thought "direct shrines" use indic locat great houses.[66][g] architecture[edit] section view kiva mesa verde' fire temple, cut laser scan data collect cyark/nat park servic partnership. sinc fire templ least partial built conform dimens cliff alcov built, neither round form truli subterranean like structur gener defin kivas. mesa verd best known larg number well-preserv cliff dwellings, hous built alcoves, rock overhang along canyon walls. structur contain within alcov mostli block hard sandstone, held togeth plaster adob mortar. specif construct mani similar gener uniqu form due individu topographi differ alcov along canyon walls. mark contrast earlier construct villag top mesas, cliff dwell mesa verd reflect region-wid trend toward aggreg grow region popul close, highli defens quarter 13th century.[67] pueblo build built stone, window face south, u, e l shapes. build locat close togeth reflect deepen religi celebration. tower built near kiva like use lookouts. potteri becam versatile, includ pitchers, ladles, bowls, jar dishwar food drink. white potteri black design emerged, pigment come plants. water manag conserv techniques, includ use reservoir silt-retain dams, also emerg period.[68] style sandstone/mortar constructions, surfac cliff dwellings, includ t-shape window doors. taken archaeologists, includ stephen h. lekson, evid continu reach chacoan system.[69] research see element part gener puebloan style and/or spiritu significance, rather evid continu specif elit socioeconom system.[70] much construct site consist common pueblo architectur forms, includ kivas, towers, pit-houses, space constrict alcov necessit seem far denser concentr populations. mug house, typic cliff dwell period, home around 100 peopl share 94 small room eight kiva built share mani walls; builder area maxim space way could, area consid off-limit construction.[38] astronomy[edit] sun templ mesa verd mesa verdean use astronom observ plan farm religi ceremonies, draw natur featur landscap masonri structur built purpose. sever great hous region align cardin directions, posit windows, doors, wall along path sun, whose ray would indic pass seasons. mesa verde' sun templ thought astronom observatory.[71] templ d-shaped, align 10.7 degre true east-west.[72] locat orient indic builder understood cycl sun moon.[73] align major lunar standstill, occur everi 18.6 years, sunset winter solstice, view set templ platform south end cliff palace, across fewk canyon. bottom canyon sun templ fire pit, illumin first ray rise sun winter solstice. sun templ one largest exclus ceremoni structur ever built ancestr puebloans.[74][h] agricultur water-control systems[edit] far view reservoir start 6th century, farmer live central mesa verd cultiv corn, beans, squash, gourds. combin corn bean provid mesa verdean amino acid complet protein. condit good, 3 4 acr (1.2 1.6&#160;ha) land would provid enough food famili three four individu one year, provid supplement game wild plants. mesa verdean increasingli reli corn dietari staple, success failur crop yield factor heavili lives. mesa tilt slightli south, increas exposur sun.[76] introduct pottery, food baked, roasted, parched. hot rock drop contain could bring water brief boil, bean must boil hour use widespread potteri dissemin throughout region. increas avail ceram 600, bean becam much easier cook. provid high qualiti protein reduc relianc hunting. also aid corn cultivation, legum add much need nutrient soil grown in, like increas corn yields.[77] mesa verdean practic dri farming, reli rain water crops, other util runoff, springs, seeps, natur collect pools. start 9th century, dug maintain reservoir caught runoff summer shower spring snowmelt; crop water hand.[78] archeologist believ prior 13th century, spring sourc water consid share public resources, mesa verdean move increasingli larger pueblo built near around water suppli control privat limit member surround community.[79] 750 800, mesa verdean began construct two larg water contain structur canyon bottoms&#160;– morefield box elder reservoirs. soon afterward, work began two more: far view sagebrush reservoirs, approxim 90 feet (27&#160;m) across construct mesa top. reservoir lie east-west line run approxim 6 mile (9.7&#160;km), suggest builder follow central plan system. 2004, american societi civil engin design four structur nation civil engin histor landmarks.[80] 2014 geospati analys suggest neither collect retent water possibl far view reservoir. interpret view structur ceremoni space process road adapt chacoan culture.[81] hunt foraging[edit] ancestr puebloan bone awl mesa verdean typic harvest local small game, sometim organ hunt parti travel long distances. main sourc anim protein came mule deer rabbits, occasion hunt bighorn sheep, antelope, elk.[82] began domest turkey start around 1000, 13th centuri consumpt anim peaked, supplant deer primari protein sourc mani sites. domest turkey consum larg amount corn, deepen relianc stapl crop.[83] puebloan wove blanket turkey feather rabbit fur, made implement awl needl turkey deer bones. despit avail fish area' river streams, archeolog evid suggest rare eaten.[82] mesa verdean supplement diet gather seed fruit wild plants, search larg expans land procur resources. depend season, collect piñon nut junip berries, weedi goosefoot, pigweed, purslane, tomatillo, tansi mustard, globe mallow, sunflow seeds, yucca, well variou speci grass cacti. prickli pear fruit provid rare sourc natur sugar. wild seed cook ground porridge. use sagebrush mountain mahogany, along piñon juniper, firewood. also smoke wild tobacco.[84] ancestr puebloan consid materi consum discard commun sacred, midden pile view reverence. start basketmak iii period, c. 700, mesa verdean often buri dead mounds.[71] pottery[edit] mesa verd black-on-whit mesa verd corrug jar scholar divid whether potteri invent four corner region introduc south. specimen shallow, unfir clay bowl found canyon de chelli indic innov might deriv use clay bowl parch seeds. repeat use render bowl hard impervi water, might repres first fire potteri region. altern theori suggest potteri origin mogollon rim area south, brown-past bowl use first centuri common era.[85] other believ potteri introduc mesa verd mexico, c. 300 ce.[86] evid ancient potteri market region, archeologist believ local potter exchang decor ware families. cook pot made crush igneou rock temper place like ute mountain resili desirable, puebloan throughout region trade them.[87] neutron activ analysi indic much black-on-whit potteri found mesa verd produc locally. cretac clay dakota menefe format use black-on-whit wares, manco format clay corrug jars.[88][i] evid potteri type move sever locat around region suggest interact group ancient potters, might share common sourc raw materials.[88] mesa verd black-on-whit potteri produc three locations: sand canyon, castl rock, mesa verde.[89] archeolog evid indic nearli everi household least one member work potter. trench kiln construct away pueblo closer sourc firewood. size vary, larger one 24 feet (7.3&#160;m) long thought share kiln serv sever families. design ad ceram vessel yucca-leaf brush paint made iron, manganese, beeplant, tansi mustard.[90] potteri found 9th centuri pueblo size individu small families, commun ceremoni expand 13th century, mani larger, feast–siz vessel produced.[91] corrug decor appear mesa verd grey ware 700, 1000 entir vessel craft way. techniqu creat rough exterior surfac easier hold regular grey wares, smooth.[92] 11th centuri corrug vessels, dissip heat effici smoother ones, larg replac older style, whose tendenc retain heat made prone boil over.[93] corrug like develop ancient potter attempt mimic visual properti coil basketry.[94] corrug ware made use clay format menefee, suggest ancient potter select differ clay differ styles.[89] potter also select clay alter fire condit achiev specif colors. normal conditions, pot made manco shale turn grey fired, made morrison format clay turn white. clay southeastern utah turn red fire high-oxygen environment.[93] rock art murals[edit] mesa verde' petroglyph point; glyph repres (top; right left) eagle, mountain sheep, parrot, horn toad, mountain lion clans, ancestr puebloan (bottom).[95] rock art found throughout mesa verd region, dispers uneven periodic. locat numer examples; other none, period saw prolif creation, other saw little. style also vari time. exampl rel rare mesa verd proper, abund middl san juan river area, might indic river' import travel rout key sourc water. common motif rock art region include, anthropomorph figur process copul childbirth, handprints, anim peopl tracks, wavi lines, spirals, concentr circles, animals, hunt scenes.[96] region' popul plummet late 13th century, subject mesa verdean rock art increasingli shift depict shields, warriors, battl scenes.[97] modern hopi interpret petroglyph mesa verde' petroglyph point depict variou clan people.[95] start late pueblo ii period (1020) continu pueblo iii (1300), ancestr puebloan mesa verd region creat plaster mural great houses, particularli kivas. mural contain paint inscrib imag depict animals, people, design use textil potteri date back far basketmak iii, c. 500. other depict triangl mound thought repres mountain hill surround landscape. mural typic locat face kiva bench usual encircl room. geometr pattern resembl symbol use potteri zigzag repres stitch use basket make common motifs. paint mural includ color red, green, yellow, white, brown, blue. design still use hopi 15th 16th centuries.[98] anthropogen ecology, geography, climate[edit] anthropogen ecolog refer human impact anim plant ecosystem.[82] shift medium larg game animals, deer, bighorn sheep, antelope, smaller one like rabbit turkey mid-10th mid-13th centuri might indic mesa verdean subsist hunt dramat alter faunal popul mesa.[99] analysi pack rat midden indic that, except invas speci tumblewe clover, flora fauna area remain rel consist past 4,000 years.[100] mesa verde' canyon creat stream erod hard sandston cover area. result mesa verd nation park elev rang 6,000 8,572 feet (1,829 2,613&#160;m), highest elev park point. terrain park transit zone low desert plateau rocki mountains.[68] region' precipit pattern bimodal, mean agricultur sustain snowfal winter autumn rainfal spring summer.[41] climat semi-arid. water farm consumpt provid summer rains, winter snowfall, seep spring near mesa verd villages. 7,000 feet (2,100&#160;m), middl mesa area typic ten degre cooler mesa top, reduc amount water need farming.[101] cliff dwell built take advantag solar energy. angl sun winter warm masonri cliff dwellings, warm breez blew valley, air ten twenti degre warmer canyon alcov top mesa. summer, sun high overhead, much villag protect direct sunlight high cliff dwellings.[102] geology[edit] although area' first spanish explor name featur mesa verde, term misnomer, true mesa almost perfectli flat. mesa verd slant south, proper geolog term cuesta, mesa. park made sever smaller cuesta locat canyons. mesa verde' slant contribut format alcov preserv area' cliff dwellings.[103] late cretac period, manco shale deposit top dakota sandstone, rock format found much colorado. bed manco shale "fine-grain sand-stones, mudstones, shales" accumul deep water cretac sea. high clay content caus expand wet lead slide terrain. top shale, three format mesaverd group reflect chang deposit environ area time. first point lookout sandstone, name point lookout featur park (elev 8427 feet). sandstone, form marin environ shallow water cretac sea receding, "massive, fine-grained, cross-bedded, resistant", layer reflect wave current present time formation. sediment approxim 400 feet thick, upper layer featur fossilifer invertebrates.[104] next menefe formation, middl format whose content featur interbed carbonac shales, siltstones, sandstones. deposit semi-marin environ brackish water, swamp lagoons. due deposit environ organ materi composition, thin coal seam run menefe formation. top, format intrud upon cliff hous sandstone.[104] cliff hous sandston area' youngest rock layer. form cretac sea complet reced result high sand content beaches, dunes, etc. receiv characterist yellow tint canyon faces. like point lookout sandstone, 400 feet thick. contain numer fossil bed differ type shells, fish teeth, invertebr leftov reced sea. shale zone featur determin alcov form ancestr puebloan construct dwellings.[104] continu cretac period earli tertiary, uplift area colorado plateau, san juan mountains, la plata mountains, led format mesa verd pediment help erosion. small channel water ran across format deposit gravel. later tertiary, last period uplift rock tilt toward south caus stream cut rapidli rock remov loos sediment form vast canyon seen today. caus isol mesa verd pediment surround rock. today, sinc climat arid, erosion process slowed.[104] rediscovery[edit] spruce tree hous mexican-spanish missionari explor francisco atanasio domínguez silvestr vélez de escalante, seek rout santa fe california, faith record travel 1776. reach mesa verd (green plateau) region, name high, tree-cov plateaus, never got close enough, need angle, see ancient stone villages.[105][106] first white men travel rout much colorado plateau utah back arizona new mexico.[107] mesa verd region long occupi utes, 1868 treati unit state govern recogn ute ownership colorado land west continent divide. becom interest land western colorado, new treati 1873 left ute strip land southwestern colorado border new mexico 15 mile north. mesa verd lie within strip land. ute winter warm, deep canyon found sanctuari high plateau mesa verde. believ cliff dwell sacr ancestr sites, live ancient dwellings.[105] occasion trapper prospector visited, one prospector, john moss, make observ known 1873.[108] follow year, moss led emin photograph william henri jackson manco canyon, base mesa verde. there, jackson photograph public typic stone cliff dwelling.[108] geologist william h. holm retrac jackson' rout 1875.[108] report jackson holm includ 1876 report hayden survey, one four feder financ effort explor american west. public led propos systemat studi southwestern archeolog sites.[108] quest find ancestr puebloan settlements, virginia mcclurg, journalist new york daili graphic, visit mesa verd 1882 1885. parti rediscov echo cliff house, three tier house, balconi hous 1885; discoveri inspir protect dwell artifacts.[68][109] wetherills[edit] famili cattl ranchers, wetherills, befriend member ute tribe near ranch southwest mancos, colorado. ute tribe' approval, wetheril allow bring cattl lower, warmer plateau present ute reserv winter. word ancestr puebloan great hous spread, acowitz, member ute tribe, told wetheril special cliff dwell mesa verde: "deep canyon near head mani hous old people&#160;– ancient ones. one houses, high, high rocks, bigger others. ute never go there, sacr place."[110][111] decemb 18, 1888, richard wetheril cowboy charli mason rediscov cliff palac spot ruin top mesa verde. wetheril gave ruin present-day name. richard wetherill, famili friend explor ruin gather artifacts, sold histor societi colorado much kept.[112][111] among peopl stay wetheril explor cliff dwell mountaineer, photographer, author frederick h. chapin, visit region 1889 1890. describ landscap ruin 1890 articl later 1892 book, land cliff-dwellers, illustr hand-drawn map person photographs.[109] gustaf nordenskiöld[edit] cliff palac 1891, gustaf nordenskiöld wetheril also host gustaf nordenskiöld, son polar explor adolf erik nordenskiöld, 1891.[113][114] nordenskiöld train mineralogist introduc scientif method artifact collection, record locations, photograph extensively, diagram sites, correl observ exist archeolog literatur well home-grown expertis wetherills.[115] remov lot artifact sent sweden, eventu went nation museum finland. nordenskiöld published, 1893, cliff dweller mesa verde.[116] nordenskiöld ship collect made mesa verd artifacts, event initi concern need protect mesa verd land resources.[117] nation park[edit] park map 1889, goodman point pueblo becam first pre-columbian archeolog site mesa verd region gain feder protection. first site protect us.[34] virginia mcclurg dilig effort 1887 1906 inform unit state european commun import protect import histor materi dwell mesa verde. effort includ enlist support 250,000 women feder women' clubs, write publish poem popular magazines, give speech domest internationally, form colorado cliff dweller association. colorado cliff dwellers' purpos protect resourc colorado cliff dwellings, reclaim much origin artifact possibl share inform peopl dwelt there. fellow activist protect mesa verd prehistor archeolog site includ luci peabody, who, locat washington, d.c., met member congress cause.[115][118][109] former mesa verd nation park superintend robert heyder commun belief park might far signific hundr artifact taken nordenskiöld.[119] jess walter fewk mesa verd cliff dwellings, c. 1910 end 19th century, clear mesa verd need protect peopl gener came mesa verd creat sold collect artifacts. report secretari interior, smithsonian institut ethnologist jess walter fewk describ vandal mesa verde' cliff palace: parti "curio seekers" camp ruin sever winters, report mani hundr specimen carri mesa sold privat individuals. object museums, mani forev lost science. order secur valuabl archeolog material, wall broken down&#160;... often simpli let light darker rooms; floor invari open buri kiva mutilated. facilit work get rid dust, great open broken five wall form front ruin. beam use firewood great extent singl roof remains. work destruction, ad result eros due rain, left cliff palac sad condition.[120] mani artifact mesa verd locat museum privat collect usa across world. repres select potteri vessel objects, example, british museum london.[121] 1906, presid theodor roosevelt approv creation mesa verd nation park feder antiqu act 1906.[122] park effort "preserv work man" first kind. park name spanish term green tabl forest junip piñon trees.[123] excav protection[edit] 1908 1922, spruce tree house, cliff palace, sun templ ruin stabilized.[124] earli effort led jess walter fewkes.[125] 1930 40s, civilian conserv corp workers, start 1932, play key role excav efforts, build trail roads, creat museum exhibit construct build mesa verde.[125] 1958 1965, wetheril mesa archeolog project includ archeolog excavations, stabil sites, surveys. excav studi eleven wetheril mesa sites, consid largest archeolog effort us.[125] project oversaw excav long hous mug house.[126] 1966, histor area administ nation park service, mesa verd list nation regist histor places, 1987, mesa verd administr district list register.[127] design world heritag site 1978.[125] 2015 travel awards, sunset magazin name mesa verd nation park "the best cultur attraction" western unit states.[128] services[edit] park ranger give tour mesa verd nation park entranc mesa verd nation park u.s. rout 160, approxim 9 mile (14&#160;km) east commun cortez 7 mile (11&#160;km) west mancos, colorado.[129] park cover 52,485 acr (21,240&#160;ha)[130] contain 4,372 document sites, includ 600 cliff dwellings.[131] largest archeolog preserv us.[132] protect import best preserv archeolog site country.[123] park initi archeolog site conserv program 1995. analys data pertain site construct utilized.[126] mesa verd visitor research center locat highway 160 park entranc booths. visitor research center open decemb 2012. chapin mesa (the popular area) 20 mile (32&#160;km) beyond visitor center.[129] mesa verd nation park area feder exclus jurisdiction. law enforcement, emerg medic service, wildland/structur fire duti conduct feder nation park servic law enforc rangers. mesa verd nation park post offic zip code 81330.[133] access park facil vari season. three cliff dwell chapin mesa open public. chapin mesa archeolog museum open year. spruce tree hous also open year, weather permitting. balconi house, long hous cliff palac requir tour ticket ranger-guid tours. mani dwell visibl road open tourists. park offer hike trails, campground, and, peak season, facil food, fuel, lodging; unavail winter.[129] wildfir cultur modifi trees[edit] wildfir damag chapin mesa year 1996 2003, park suffer sever wildfires.[134] fires, mani start lightn time drought, burn 28,340 acr (11,470&#160;ha) forest, half park. fire also damag mani archeolog site park buildings. named: chapin v (1996), bircher poni (2000), long mesa (2002), balconi hous complex fire (2003), five fire began day. chapin v poni fire destroy two rock art sites, long mesa fire nearli destroy museum&#160;– first one ever built nation park system&#160;– spruce tree house, third largest cliff dwell park.[135] prior fire 1996 2003, archeologist survey approxim nineti percent park. dens undergrowth tree cover kept mani ancient site hidden view, chapin v, bircher poni fires, 593 previous undiscov site revealed&#160;– date basketmak iii pueblo periods. also uncov fire extens water contain features, includ 1,189 check dams, 344 terraces, five reservoir date pueblo ii iii periods.[136] februari 2008, colorado histor societi decid invest part $7&#160;million budget cultur modifi tree project nation park.[137] ute mountain tribal park[edit] main article: ute mountain tribal park ute mountain tribal park, adjoin mesa verd nation park east mountains, approxim 125,000 acr (51,000&#160;ha) along manco river. hundr surfac sites, cliff dwellings, petroglyphs, wall paint ancestr puebloan ute cultur preserv park. nativ american ute tour guid provid background inform people, culture, histori park lands. nation geograph travel chose one "80 world destin travel 21st century", one nine place select us.[138] key sites[edit] addit cliff dwellings, mesa verd boast number mesa-top ruins.[139] exampl open public access includ far view complex cedar tree tower chapin mesa, badger hous community, wetheril mesa.[140] balconi house[edit] emmett harryson, navajo, t-shape doorway balconi hous (1929) balconi hous set high ledg face east. 45 room 2 kiva would cold winter. visitor ranger-guid tour enter climb 32-foot ladder crawl 12-foot tunnel. exit, seri toe-hold cleft cliff, believ entri exit rout cliff dwellers, made small villag easi defend secure. one log date 1278, like built long mesa verd peopl migrat area.[141][142] offici excav 1910 jess nusbaum, one first superintend mesa verd nation park.[143] visitor enter balconi hous ranger-guid tours.[144] cliff palace[edit] main article: cliff palac multi-stori ruin, best-known cliff dwell mesa verde, locat largest alcov center great mesa. south- southwest-facing, provid greater warmth sun winter. date back 700 years, dwell construct sandstone, wooden beams, mortar.[145] mani room brightli painted.[146][147] cliff palac home approxim 125 people, like import part larger commun sixti nearbi pueblos, hous combin six hundr people. 23 kiva 150 rooms, cliff palac largest cliff dwell mesa verd nation park.[30] long house[edit] locat wetheril mesa, long hous second-largest mesa verdean village; approxim 150 peopl live there. locat excav 1959 1961, part wetherhil mesa archeolog project.[148] long hous built c. 1200; occupi 1280. cliff dwell featur 150 rooms, kiva, tower, central plaza.[149] room cluster like typic cliff dwellings. stone use without shape fit stability. two overhead ledg contain storag space grain. one ledg seem includ overlook small hole wall see rest villag below. spring access within sever hundr feet, seep locat rear village.[150] mug, oak tree, spruce tree, squar tower houses[edit] mug hous locat wetheril mesa; contain 94 rooms, larg kiva, nearbi reservoir. receiv name four mug charl mason wetheril brother found strung togeth site.[151] oak tree hous neighbor fire templ visit via 2-hour ranger-guid hike.[152] spruce tree hous third-largest village, within sever hundr feet spring, 130 room eight kivas. construct sometim 1211 1278. believ anywher 60 80 peopl live one time.[153] protect location, well preserved.[154][153] short trail spruce tree hous begin chapin mesa archeolog museum.[155] squar tower hous one stop mesa top loop road drive tour.[155] tower tallest structur mesa verde.[156] references[edit] note ^ corn introduc great sage plain, region north west mesa verde, mexico.[8] ^ donna glowacki refut position, suggest peopl aztec never achiev wide-spread influenc chaco canyon. believ relationship mesa verd aztec like one competit conflict, versu religi social hegemony.[28] ^ earliest known evid large-scal violenc region uncov southeastern utah. futur mesa verd rediscoverer, richard wetherill, lead hyde explor expedition, locat site, call "cave 7", bodi nearli 100 men, women, children found. date late basketmak ii period (200 bce 500 ce). evid defens structures, palisad stockades, date 7th 11th centuri uncov near ancient mesa verdean farmsteads.[48] ^ spanish first settl area 1598, propos ute navajo driven ancestr puebloan away mesa verde.[56] 1891, gustaf nordenskiöld propos mesa verdean driven away area hostil intruders. earli 20th century, contemporari nativ american describ region abandoned, rather view stage area' ongo indigen culture.[57] ^ time, entireti zuni peopl believ migrat western new mexico. archeolog evid suggest anoth larg (2007), "mesa verd settlement histori relocation: climat change, social networks, ancestr pueblo migration", kiva 72 (4), pp.&#160;379–405&#160; fitzgerald, michael (march 14, 2009), majesti mesa verde: colorado, canyon ancient dwell still awe, wall street journal, p.&#160;w12, retriev june 1, 2015&#160; glowacki, donna m.; neff, hector; glascock, michael d. (1998), "an initi assess product movement thirteenth centuri ceram vessel mesa verd region", kiva 63 (3), pp.&#160;217–41&#160; harden, mark (2015), colorado landmark name west' best cultur attraction, denver busi journal, retriev june 16, 2015&#160; harris, ann g.; tuttle, esther; tuttle, sherwood d. (2004), "mesa verd nation park", geolog nation park (6 ed.), kendal hunt publishing, pp.&#160;91–102, isbn&#160;978-0-7872-9971-2&#160; hurst, winston; till, jonathan (2006), "mesa verdean sacr landscapes", nobel, david grant, mesa verd world: explor ancestr puebloan archaeology, school american research press, pp.&#160;74–83, isbn&#160;978-1-930618-75-6&#160; kantner, john (2004), ancient puebloan southwest, cambridg univers press, isbn&#160;978-0-521-78880-9&#160; kohler, timothi a.
